## Usage

Close the repo

```bash
git clone --recurse-submodules -j$(nproc) git@github.com:Mbarleon/Raytracer.git
```

Install dependencies with `gitmodules` using our automatic script:

```bash
./build.sh
```

Run the project

```bash
./raytracer examples/minimal.jsonc
```

---
